full_summary:
# Invitation to Submit an Expression of Interest (EOI)
## Lease Space in Halifax Regional Municipality, Nova Scotia
### File Number: 81002954

Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites parties to express interest in leasing office space within the Halifax Regional Municipality, Nova Scotia. The space must meet specific requirements outlined below.

### Lease Components
- Approximate 10-year lease term, with options for two 5-year extensions
- 503.4 m2 of contiguous office space, with 12 parking spaces
- Space must be available 20 weeks prior to lease commencement
- Minimum requirements include:
    - A commercial or municipal building
    - Commercial or municipal parking within a 500-metre walking distance
    - Compatibility with PSPC's operational and security needs
    - Zoning compliance

### Location Requirements
- Space must be located within the Halifax Regional Municipality, Nova Scotia
- Specific boundaries for the search area are outlined above

### Evaluation Criteria
- Proposals will be evaluated based on the requirements outlined above
- PSPC reserves the right to weigh factors beyond those listed here

### Action Required
- Parties interested in leasing space must submit their response to this EOI by February 20, 2024
- Please include:
    - File number (81002954)
    - Location and municipal address of the building
    - Current zoning
    - Measured area of the space
    - Detailed architectural plans
    - Proof of authorization from property owners for agents submitting a response

### Security Clearance
- Agents submitting a response must hold a valid security clearance at the 'Reliability' level, prior to award
- Information on the Contract Security Program can be found at https://www.tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca/esc-src/index-en.qc.html

### Additional Information
- For further information, please contact Jeff MacDonald by phone at 902-628-5254 or by email at jeffery.macdonald@pwgsc-tpsgc.gc.ca

### Disclaimer
- This is not a tender process or a request for proposal. PSPC may not invite offers, lease the space, or publish future notices related to this request.
- The information provided may be used to inform future leasing requirements. Credentials shall be stored in our list of available space that allows us to save different types of space for other people who have certain qualifications and will help to our future paperwork.`
